Comment 13 by **tylerbunnell**: 
I've been doing a bit of experimentation around this issue, and I've found something
interesting.

If I delete "$GOROOT/pkg/darwin_amd64_race" and then run "go test -race", the race
packages are automatically re-built and installed. It only takes a few seconds.

It would seem this issue is already handled? Or am I missing something important here?
